targets.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> unique(column: "aggr")
  |> count(column: "aggr")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "raid_plex_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "raid_disk_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "volume_count_flexvol")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_used_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_available")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["new_status_code", "volume_count_flexvol", "raid_disk_count", "space_total", "space_used", "space_used_percent"]))
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_physical_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with unique_name: r.node + " - " + r.aggr}) )
  |> group(columns: ["unique_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_available")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with unique_name: r.node + " - " + r.aggr}) )
  |> group(columns: ["unique_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_capacity_tier_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with display_name: r.node + " - " + r.aggr}) )
  |> group(columns: ["display_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_data_compaction_saved")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with unique_name: r.node + " - " + r.aggr}) )

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and r["_field"] == "space_sis_saved")

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr" and contains(value: r["_field"], set: ["space_data_compaction_saved_percent", "space_sis_saved_percent"]))
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with unique_name: r.node + " - " + r.aggr + " (" + r._field + ")"}) )
  |> group(columns: ["unique_name"], mode:"by")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr")
  |> keep(columns: ["datacenter"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "datacenter")
list.name: Datacenter
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr")
  |> keep(columns: ["datacenter"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "datacenter")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> keep(columns: ["cluster"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "cluster")
list.name: Cluster
list.query:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["datacenter"] == "${Datacenter}")
  |> keep(columns: ["cluster"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "cluster")

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: -3h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggr")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cluster"] == "${Cluster}")
  |> keep(columns: ["node"])
  |> group()
  |> distinct(column: "node")
list.name: Node

  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r["node"], set: ${Node:json}))

from(bucket: "${Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
